duck: Context (language use), the relevant constraints of the communicative situation that influence language use, language variation, and discourse summary
Opaque context, linguistic context in which substitution of co-referential expressions does not preserve truth
Context menu, a menu in a graphical user interface that appears upon user interaction
context definition: the parts of a discourse that surround a word or passage and can throw light on its meaning.
Archaeological context, an event in time which has been preserved in the archaeological record
Trama (mycology) (context or flesh), the mass of non-hymenial tissues that composes the mass of a fungal fruiting body

wiki.text:
'Context' may refer to:

* Context (language use), the relevant constraints of the communicative
  situation that influence language use, language variation, and
  discourse summary
* Archaeological context, an event in time which has been preserved in the
  archaeological record
* Opaque context, linguistic context in which substitution of co-referential
  expressions does not preserve truth
* Trama (mycology) (context or flesh), the mass of non-hymenial tissues that
  composes the mass of a fungal fruiting body
wiki.title: context
